hadiths.text: Abu Sa'id al-Khudri reported that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:When any one of you prays he should not let anyone pass in front of him (if there is no sutra), and should try to turn him away as far as possible, but if he refuses to go, he should turn him away forcibly for he is a devil

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْعِ الْمَارِّ بَيْنَ يَدَىِ الْمُصَلِّي
chapter.eng-name: Preventing One Who Wants To Pass In Front Of A Praying Person
